name: Lost Goblins
description:
This a puzzle game where you will need to save goblins lost in your dungeon.

Control:
Mouse and keyboard arrows.
Read texts the bottom text it helps!

Credits:
Florian Dufour (dev, assets, music, sounds)
Matthieu Saül (dev, assets)

Voices:
Maxime Chatagnier
Quentin Calabrese

We used existing assets:
- For some [particle effect](https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/particles/cartoon-fx-free-109565)
- For [UI](https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/gui/icons/wooden-ui-93545)
